channel.title: How can I install mods manually?
channel.description:
[https://docs.ficsit.app/satisfactory-modding/latest/ManualInstallDirections.html](https://docs.ficsit.app/satisfactory-modding/latest/ManualInstallDirections.html)
Although I did everything right in the docs part, the SML installation occurred, but I could not activate the mods. Is there any other place where I need to install mods?
Is there anyone who can help me with this?

item.title: How can I install mods manually?
item.dc:creator: @Ryan_Matthys Ryan Matthys
item.description:
@Ryan_Matthys wrote:

There are instructions to deal with that error message on the discord. In short, because of the difference between EA and EXP right now, there’s different SMM versions, and auto-update is temporarily disabled. Go to the discord and follow the instructions there for whichever game branch you’re using.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I install mods manually?

item.title: How can I install mods manually?
item.dc:creator: @Ano_Kius Ano Kius
item.description:
@Ano_Kius wrote:

As far as I know mods only work in the stable version this time.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I install mods manually?

item.title: How can I install mods manually?
item.dc:creator: @Jim_B Jim B
item.description:
@Jim_B wrote:

I do not even see the “Install” button anymore after the 3.1 update. I installed Experimental and went to 3.1 but still did not see it. Nothing I have tried lets me see the button so I cannot use the SMM now except to update mods. I have cleared caches and cookies and reinstalled the SMM and SML over and over and nothing. It worked until that last upgrade of the SML. 3.1 requires game version 151773 and Steam version is 151248 but in the game launch it says they are the same? Frustrating.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I install mods manually?

item.title: How can I install mods manually?
item.dc:creator: @Aykut_Tasci Aykut Taşcı
item.description:
@Aykut_Tasci wrote:

I get a plugin error when I install SML 3.0. It will no longer be installed manually.

Thanks anyway mate.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I install mods manually?

item.title: How can I install mods manually?
item.dc:creator: @Ano_Kius Ano Kius
item.description:
@Ano_Kius wrote:

Don’t do this manually! Use the Modmanager but with SML 3.0 ! If you have old mods installed then de-install all mods, change the SML to 3.0 and then install the compatible mods.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I install mods manually?
